00003 package Value::Infinity;
00004 my $pkg = 'Value::Infinity';
00005 
00006 use strict; no strict "refs";
00007 our @ISA = qw(Value);

00009 #
00010 #  Create an infinity object
00011 #
00012 sub new {
00013   my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
00014   my $context = (Value::isContext($_[0]) ? shift : $self->context);
00015   Value::Error("Infinity should have no parameters") if scalar(@_);
00016   bless {
00017     data => [$self->getFlag('infiniteWord')],
00018     isInfinite => 1, isNegative => 0,
00019     context => $context,
00020   }, $class;
00021 }

00024 #  Return the appropriate data.
00025 #

00027 sub typeRef {$Value::Type{infinity}}
00028 sub value {shift->{data}[0]}

00030 sub isZero {0}
00031 sub isOne {0}

00037 #
00038 #  Return an infinity or real
00039 #
00040 sub promote {
00041   my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
00042   my $context = (Value::isContext($_[0]) ? shift : $self->context);
00043   my $x = (scalar(@_) ? shift : $self); $x = [$x,@_] if scalar(@_) > 0;
00044   $x = Value::makeValue($x,context=>$context);
00045   return $x->inContext($context)
00046     if ref($x) eq $class || ref($x) eq $pkg || Value::isReal($x);
00047   Value::Error("Can't convert %s to %s",Value::showClass($x),$self->showClass);
00048 }

00050 ############################################
00051 #
00052 #  Operations on Infinities
00053 #
00054 
00055 sub neg {
00056   my $self = shift;
00057   my $neg = $self->Package("Infinity")->new($self->context);
00058   $neg->{isNegative} = !$self->{isNegative};
00059   $neg->{data}[0] = '-'.$neg->{data}[0] if $neg->{isNegative};
00060   return $neg;
00061 }
00062 
00063 sub compare {
00064   my ($l,$r,$flag) = @_;
00065   my $sgn = ($flag ? -1: 1);
00066   $r = $l->promote($r);
00067   return 0 if !$r->classMatch('Real') && $l->{isNegative} == $r->{isNegative};
00068   return ($l->{isNegative}? -$sgn: $sgn);
00069 }

00075 
00076 sub TeX {(shift->{isNegative} ? '-\infty ': '\infty ')}
00077 sub perl {(shift->{isNegative} ? '-(Infinity)': '(Infinity)')}
